moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock into a right walking stance. Middle front punch with the right hand.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Pivot 90 degrees left on the left foot to face 9 o'clock, bringing the right foot back into a walking stance towards 3 o'clock. Low block with the left outer forearm.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock with your right leg into a walking stance. Middle right front punch.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Pivot 90 degrees left on the left foot to face 6 o'clock, bringing the right foot back into a walking stance towards 12 o'clock. Low block with the left outer forearm.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock with your right leg into a walking stance. Middle right front punch.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Pivot 90 degrees left on the left foot to face 3 o'clock, bringing the right foot back into a walking stance towards 3 o'clock. Low block with the left outer forearm.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward to 3 o'clock with your right leg into a walking stance. Middle front punch with a kihap.

moves.title: parallel ready stance
moves.description: Step the right foot back to parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock with your left leg into a walking stance. Middle front punch.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Pivot 90 degrees right on the right foot to face 3 o'clock, bringing the left foot back into a walking stance towards 9 o'clock. Low  block with the right outer forearm.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward to 3 o'clock with your left leg into a walking stance. Middle front punch.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Pivot 90 degrees right on the right foot to face 6 o'clock, bringing the left foot back into a walking stance towards 12 o'clock. Low block with the right outer forearm.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock with your left leg into a walking stance. Middle left front punch.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Pivot 90 degrees right on the right foot to face 9 o'clock, bringing the left foot back into a walking stance towards 3 o'clock. Low  block with the right outer forearm.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok najunde makgi

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward to 9 o'clock with your left leg into a walking stance. Middle left front punch with a kihap.

moves.title: parallel ready stance
moves.description: Bring the left foot back to parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.
